name: excel-plugin
description: A sample Office.js project with custom functions.

scripts.start: npx office-addin-debugging start manifest.xml --app "Microsoft Excel" --dev-server "http-server -p 3000 -S -C localhost.pem -K localhost-key.pem --cors"
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.xml taskpane.html vercel.json dist/ && cp -r asset dist/
